price: Ata thirrën: “Digjeni atë dhe ndihmoni zotat tuaj, nëse doni të bëni ndonjë vepër!”
arabic: قَالُواْ حَرِّقُوهُ وَٱنصُرُوٓاْ ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ فَٰعِلِينَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: qālū ḥarriqūhu wa-unṣurū ālihatakum in kuntum fāʿilīna
